Message:
Skipping her way
into the kitchen,
Cerberus peered down
at my handiwork.
“Is that what I think it is...?!”

“I knew it, I knew it!
Big Sis remembered after all!”

“Of course!
I’m going to give you
a special candy this year,
so make sure
you look forward to it, okay?”

“Hehe, yaaaay~!♪
I’m so happy I can finally have
Big Sis’s candy again!

“Huh? You want to
help make them, Cerberus?”

Cerberus...wants to make
her own birthday present...?

“Yeah!
I wanna make them with you!
Can I, can I?!”

“Hehe, of course you can!
Let’s make them together, then.

But, fire is dangerous,
so don’t touch it, alright?”
